topic.title: Cluster Operating System Rolling Upgrade
topic.shortdesc: Cluster Operating System Rolling Upgrade enables an administrator to upgrade the operating system of the cluster nodes from Windows Server 2012 R2 to Windows Server 2016 without stopping the Hyper-V or the Scale-Out File Server workloads. Using this feature, the downtime penalties against Service Level Agreements SLA can be avoided.

body.p: For more info, see Cluster Operating System Rolling Upgrade../failover-clustering/Cluster-Operating-System-Rolling-Upgrade.md.
